entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29 except minus 22 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29 except minus 22 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 38 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6 except minus 2 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6 except minus 2 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15 except minus 5 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 15 except minus 5 near the Alberta border. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
